scripts.deploy:test:token: npx env-cmd -f .env.stg hardhat run scripts/1.pitcoin.deploy.js --network base_sepolia
scripts.deploy:test:game: npx env-cmd -f .env.stg hardhat run scripts/2.war.deploy.js --network base_sepolia
scripts.deploy:main:token: npx env-cmd -f .env.stg hardhat run scripts/1.pitcoin.deploy.js --network base
scripts.deploy:main:game: npx env-cmd -f .env.stg hardhat run scripts/2.war.deploy.js --network base
